replies.body:
Riot, if we don't get URF directly after this, people may start remaking that 'It's been 3000 years' Pokemon Meme

Please give us URF
On April Fools Riot should release an URF that actually just queues you up for Poro King XD
AND allow it to be played custom too!
I didn't know I was missing out on custom urf games until we didn't have it. Hope we get regular Urf with customs YEAH
they said they will put it up as soon as it starts working on beta client
I just want to see the new game mode rotation{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
WE WANT URF{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
I do too so much, its really fun omg
same
Same lol everyday im im checking for rotation 33

replies.poster: K I N G Z E B
replies.body:
Poro king is not that enjoyable even ARAM is better i think bc people get random picks and not choosing champs which are really op in all 
mid
so many people saying to give us URF back. I really don't care as long as its not frickin poro king again  (pre sure we've had like 20-25 poro king rotations last year {{summoner:3}} ).
3 weeks of the most bland mode in the game? But why
We got no gift :((((((\
log in here to support commenters about URF...
Would it be possible to have both URF and ARURF up at the same time? Because i know many people prefer picking the champions they want to play, instead of being stuck with something like urf yasuo
So we can have countless weekends of legend of the poro king yet graves {{champion:104}} can't have a cigar.. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} wtf

**itssofunnyamirite**
{{champion:104}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:104}}
Please don't bring us URF, because people who whine about URF are annoying and deserve to not get what they want.  Any other game mode is fine.  Thank you.
So what you are saying is... as a company, Riot shouldn't deliver to the customers what they want and should completely ignore their opnion? That doesn't make a lot of sense.
this was ment to be 3 weeks its now a month of a game mode no one wants to paly ??? really riot
{{item:3151}} Noone gives a fuck about poro king. bring us URF and give me my scuttle icon
Poro King 4 Life! URF is Garbo
please give us URF
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} RIOT u no bring back URF...
URF OR RIOT
Now that we had 3 whole weeks of Poro king ( i honestly didn't play 1 game of poro king ) Give us URF pls
ikr who actually plays that mode{{champion:32}}
ikr wth im actually being honest lmfao i didnt even play 1 game not 1 game i dont even know what you do haha
same lol
So where was the special announcement? all i see advertising
I really hope we can have a fun/highly requested mode after this week.. I only play league these days for the rotating modes and the last 2 months hasn't been very interesting.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} why u dont give us urf

Poro king was just a mode for people who like to select the most annoying champions to play in such a small area and exploit the fact that they are hard to deal with. Aint nobody give a damn about poro king rito! Give us URF!
To be fair, URF was also about that, just the "small area" was cooldowns instead of the map.

I admit i enjoy playing poro king, im an ARAM main so getting to choose the op champs is good, but 3 week in a row is a little bit extreme. I love how you gave us poro king over christmas like you have every christmas but it is no longer christmas.
I got interstellar renekton skin in my loot, should I get it?
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
gr8

When riot don't give you dat URF for Christmas 
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
WE DON'T WANT URF, LISTEN TO US PLEASE NEVER GIVE US URF AGAIN {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
